home.description: Abeg fit tell us exactly where you dey stay, make we fit find better donor wey dey near you, show listings wey dey close and how many people still dey wait to share with you.

signup.heading: Create account with FoodMed
signup.terms: If you register, na say you gree to our terms and condition.
signup.success: Tuale! You don sign up well. We go carry you go login soon.
signup.failed: Wetin happen? Try sign up again.

resetPassword.error: We no fit reset your password

verifyOtp.infoText: We don send OTP go your email. Put the OTP here:
verifyOtp.error: Wetin be dis? OTP no correct.

forgotPassword.createAccount: You no get account? Oya create one
forgotPassword.text: Enter the email wey you use register.

congrats.account: Confirm we don create new account for you
